A

addChannel(Channel) - Method in class net.lapismc.lapischat.api.ChannelAPI
Adds a channel to the server
addChannel(Channel) - Method in class net.lapismc.lapischat.framework.ChatPlayer
Adds a player to a channel, this means the player will receive messages from this channel This may involve entering a password, if you wish to add a player regardless of protections use ChatPlayer.forceAddChannel(Channel)
addPlayer(ChatPlayer) - Method in class net.lapismc.lapischat.framework.Channel
This method wil call Channel.forceAddPlayer(ChatPlayer), it is primarily here to be overridden for things like password checks
applyDefaultFormat(ChatPlayer, String, String) - Method in class net.lapismc.lapischat.framework.Channel
 
applyFormat(String, String) - Method in class net.lapismc.lapischat.events.LapisChatEvent
Applies a format to a formatting tag
applyFormat(String, String) - Method in class net.lapismc.lapischat.events.LapisMessageEvent
Applies a format to a formatting tag

B

banFromChannel(Channel) - Method in class net.lapismc.lapischat.framework.ChatPlayer
This will remove the player from the channel and stop them from joining until they are unbanned

C

Channel - Class in net.lapismc.lapischat.framework
This class represents a chat channel and handles every interaction with this channel
Channel(String, String, String, Permission) - Constructor for class net.lapismc.lapischat.framework.Channel
Use this constructor if you wish to use the default format
Channel(String, String, String, Permission, String) - Constructor for class net.lapismc.lapischat.framework.Channel
Use this constructor if you wish to set your own format for this channel
ChannelAPI - Class in net.lapismc.lapischat.api
External API for accessing channels
ChannelAPI(JavaPlugin) - Constructor for class net.lapismc.lapischat.api.ChannelAPI
Get an instance of the API
ChatPlayer - Class in net.lapismc.lapischat.framework
This class represents a player using LapisChat
ChatPlayer(UUID) - Constructor for class net.lapismc.lapischat.framework.ChatPlayer
 

F

forceAddChannel(Channel) - Method in class net.lapismc.lapischat.framework.ChatPlayer
Forces a player into a channel, this overrides things like channel passwords
forceAddPlayer(ChatPlayer) - Method in class net.lapismc.lapischat.framework.Channel
This should only be called if you want to add the player based on a permission or other system rather then a player joining a channel of their own accord
format(ChatPlayer, String, String) - Method in class net.lapismc.lapischat.framework.Channel
This must be implemented by all channels, by default it should return Channel.applyDefaultFormat(ChatPlayer, String, String) This is can be used to apply extra per channel formatting tags

getRecipients(ChatPlayer) - Method in class net.lapismc.lapischat.framework.Channel
Returns the players that will receive a message if it was sent by p By default this returns the list of players in the channel this is overridden by other channels to specify distance or faction association

R

removeChannel(Channel) - Method in class net.lapismc.lapischat.api.ChannelAPI
Removes a channel from the server
removeChannel(Channel) - Method in class net.lapismc.lapischat.framework.ChatPlayer
Removing a player form a channel means they will no longer receive any messages sent in that channel MainChannel will be set to null if the channel you are removing is currently the main channel

S

savePlayerData() - Method in class net.lapismc.lapischat.framework.ChatPlayer
Saves the players channel data to their configuration file This includes the channels they are in, the channel they are chatting in and any banned channels
sendMessage(String) - Method in class net.lapismc.lapischat.framework.ChatPlayer
Send the string as a message to the player This is used by channels when they are sending messages This method will not format the message, it just sends it to the player
sendMessage(ChatPlayer, String, String) - Method in class net.lapismc.lapischat.framework.Channel
Sends a message to the recipients of the channel
setMainChannel(Channel) - Method in class net.lapismc.lapischat.framework.ChatPlayer
Sets the channel the player will send messages to

U

unBanFromChannel(Channel) - Method in class net.lapismc.lapischat.framework.ChatPlayer
Un-bans a player from the channel, this will allow them to join the channel again
